job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Job Summary: TEAM The Customer Engagement Platform (CEP) team provides powerful customer experiences across marketing touchpoints by using data and tools to bring marketing to life. The CEP Analytics - Manager I will report to the CEP Manager III, Platform Analytics, who leads both the Advanced Analytics and Business Intelligence functions within the Customer Engagement organization. ROLE This Data Scientist role on the CEP Platform Analytics team consists of two functions: building data-driven solutions and consulting with partners including leadership. This cast member will focus on delivering data science products. They will employ modeling techniques to build predictive models on guest behavior. They will also apply statistical analysis to validate the effectiveness of using these models or targeted audiences in marketing campaigns. They will consult with partners on how analytics can aid the business, to implement solutions into marketing operations, and to present insights to partners and leadership. Responsibilities: Solutions We are looking for demonstrated experience applying data science modeling techniques and proper statistical testing methodology to guest behavior (resorts, cruises, theme park tickets, merchandise) and marketing engagement. We desire someone who is comfortable planning, researching, and creating solutions. Preferred Qualifications: Required Education 833087BR
